# Project Instructions for GitHub Copilot

This project provides reusable GitHub Copilot prompts for common development tasks.

## Project Context

- This is a **demo/educational project**, not production code
- The `examples/` directory contains sample code for testing commands
- Focus on clarity and demonstrating concepts over optimization

## Code Style Preferences

- Use clear, descriptive variable names
- Include docstrings for functions
- Prefer explicit over implicit
- Use type hints in Python code
